trait.name: Demonic Ritual
entries: Brusipha can spend 3 hours performing a ritual that summons {@dice 1d3 + 1} barlguras or 1 hezrou. She must sacrifice a Medium or larger living creature to Baphomet during this ritual, and the ritual can be performed only at night. The demons vanish at dawn.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: Brusipha can perfectly recall any path she has traveled.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Brusipha makes two Eldritch Blast attacks.

action.name: Eldritch Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) force damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. If Brusipha moved at least 10 feet straight toward the target immediately before she hit, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet from Brusipha and have the {@condition prone} condition.

action.name: Incite the Hunters (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Brusipha allows each ally within 30 feet of herself that has the Unerring Tracker trait to make one weapon attack as a reaction against the target of that ally's Unerring Tracker.

reaction.name: Baphomet's Blessing
entries: When Brusipha reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 8 temporary hit points.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Brusipha casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
